definitions.definition: surrounded by; in the company of.
examples: wild strawberries hidden among the roots of the trees
synonyms: in the midst of "you're among friends"

definitions.definition: being a member or members of (a larger set).
examples: he was among the first 29 students enrolled
synonyms: in the group/number of "a child was among the injured"

definitions.definition: occurring in or practiced by (some members of a community).
examples: a drop in tooth decay among children

definitions.definition: involving most or all members of a group reciprocally.
examples: members of the government bickered among themselves

definitions.definition: indicating a division, choice, or differentiation involving three or more participants.
examples: the king called the three princesses to divide his kingdom among them
synonyms: to each of "he distributed the proceeds among his creditors"
